definition: bubble/foam/blister (i.e. skin bubble)/to soak/to steep/to infuse/to dawdle/to shilly-shally/to hang about/to pick up (a girl)/to get off with (a sexual partner)/classifier for occurrences of an action/classifier for number of infusions
puffed/swollen/spongy/small lake (esp. in place names)/classifier for urine or feces

sentences.english: Place the rice noodles in a large bowl, and cover with warm water.
sentences.chinese: 把米線放進一個大碗裏，然後用溫水浸泡。

sentences.english: Use a little milk to soak the gelatine powder first.
sentences.chinese: 吉利丁先用少許牛奶浸泡開。

sentences.english: They treat their seeds with a fungicide to combat seedling diseases.
sentences.chinese: 真菌劑浸泡種子來防止秧苗受病。

sentences.english: So we suggest that jellyfish should…
sentences.chinese: 建議海蟄食用前浸泡要多次換水。

sentences.english: To steep in or as if in the manner of tea.
sentences.chinese: 用泡茶的方式進會浸泡。

sentences.english: If you eat a it raw, he suggested deeping dipping it in vinegar.
sentences.chinese: 如果要生喫的話，他建議用醋浸泡一下。

sentences.english: An immediate cold water souse may remove the black spot from your shirt.
sentences.chinese: 立即放在涼水裏浸泡可能會去掉襯衫上的黑點。

sentences.english: December 1, 2006 — Food scientists have discovered why Rice Krispies make their characteristic sound when soaked in milk.
sentences.chinese: 食品學家發現了食物在牛奶中浸泡發出聲響的原因。

sentences.english: Leak testing is recommended for flexible endoscopes before immersion.
sentences.chinese: 在浸泡前建議對軟式內鏡進行泄漏試驗。

sentences.english: ObjectiveInspecting the best soaking time for cutting paeonia.
sentences.chinese: 目的優選白芍切片的最佳浸泡時間。

sentences.english: The fabric could be soaked in linseed oil to make it waterproof.
sentences.chinese: 經過亞麻籽油的浸泡，這種帆布能夠防水。

sentences.english: Chicken strips marinated with basil threaded on a skewer.
sentences.chinese: 雞腿肉在意大利香料中浸泡後用串肉籤串連。

sentences.english: First soak Psoralea seeds in Ginger Juice for 3 days.
sentences.chinese: 將補骨脂種子浸泡在姜水中3天。

sentences.english: Her no one sees the silver dip and shine of light on her fur.
sentences.chinese: 她的無人看見銀浸泡，照光對狐皮圍巾。

sentences.english: What could be better than a dip in the pool and fun in the sun?
sentences.chinese: 沒有比烈日下浸泡在池水中更令人快樂了。

sentences.english: Debonding was detected for hot water immersions .
sentences.chinese: 熱水浸泡後能檢驗出脫粘。
